live_updates: Expanded outage area as more Hydro related outages have occured. Thank you for your patience as we work to restore services.

35512.summary: Some customers across the Lower Mainland are experiencing interruptions to Internet, Television and Home Phone services due to BC Hydro related difficulties. We are working along side BC Hydro to restore service as quickly and safely as possible and apologize for any inconvenience caused.
